Package cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.cardModel

Class Game

java.lang.Object
cesur.zakaria.pokemonprojectzakariafarih.cardModel.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the game logic and state in the Pokemon card game.

    • play

      public void play()
      Initiates a player's turn in the game. Handles various actions based on the current game phase, such as attacks and card downloads.

    • downloadPlayingCards

      public void downloadPlayingCards(int player)
      Downloads cards for a specified player. Triggered by the "Download cards" button.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom cards should be downloaded (1 for player 1, 2 for player 2).

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Ends the current player's turn. Triggered by the "End Turn" button.

    • updateScoreboardView

      public void updateScoreboardView()
      Updates the scoreboard view based on the current game phase.

    • restart

      public void restart()
      Restarts the game, resetting all decks and stats.

    • addEnergy

      public void addEnergy(int player)
      Adds energy to a Pokémon card on the table for a specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom energy should be added (1 for player 1, 2 for player 2).

    • addGameListener

      public void addGameListener(GameListener listener)
      Adds a GameListener to the list of observers.
      Parameters:
      listener - The GameListener to add.
